name: Fruits of the Realm
description: Fruits of the Realm, a colorful wood building painted to resemble an orchid, is a fruit shop that offers a variety of fruits and fruit-based products. The shop, filled with the delightful aroma of ripe fruit, is organized by fruit type and has a back room for storing delivered items. The owner, <u>Solomon Applewood</u>, is a third-generation fruit merchant known for his cheerful demeanor and commitment to cleanliness and high-quality fruit. His apprentice, <u>Ursula Plumfield</u>, is a dedicated worker who interacts well with customers, learns to create attractive displays, and manages inventory rotation. Despite her father’s recent passing, she remains committed to her work and often takes home baskets of nearly past fruit.

quest.name: Moonstone Berry
quest.description:
A herbalist approached Solomon one day to ask if he could acquire some Moonstone Berries. Solomon asked if the herbalist knew of any place where they grew, as he was under the impression that the only place that grew them was a hostile, forbidden land more than a thousand miles across the sea.
	The herbalist, hoping Solomon knew of another source, was disappointed in that answer. He hoped to get some to make a powerful potion to enhance one’s natural ability to use magic. After chatting a bit longer, Solomon suggests that a quest could probably be paid for if they are that important and if he has the funds. He wished the herbalist good luck finding a group willing to travel there and offered to share what he knew about the island’s danger,s and the mystical guardians said to protect the Moonstone trees from harm.
